channel.title: Account Management on YWallet
channel.description: Recent content in Account Management on YWallet

item.title: New Account
item.description: New Enter the account name (required) Choose the crypto Press to create a new account The process should only take a few seconds at most. Restore Turn on the restore switch Enter the wallet key Choose the account index (if you are unsure of what this is, leave it at 0) Press the restore the account Note Usually after an import, the wallet has to rescan older blocks. If you are restoring multiple accounts, it is recommended to rescan after you have imported them all.

item.title: Notes
item.description: More/Notes This page shows the unused shielded notes received. Transparent notes (UTXO) are not managed. For more info, see Synchronization For the most part, notes are automatically selected when making payments. However, you can exclude some notes. Of course, this will reduce the spendable balance. Height Amount / Pool. The color indicates the pool of the note Date/Time Invert the selection
